description: all 9 are ceramic vases. a: light yellow paint dripped over body; b: body covered in sea foam green paint; c: body covered with salmon colored paint; light & dark brown original surface showing through at areas where paint does not cover; d: body covered with white pigment; e: bright yellow paint at bottom half and bright blue paint dripped on top; f: body covered with pink paint; g: body covered with emerald green paint that does not fully cover at top; h: red paint at bottom; emerald green paint at bottom that drips upwards towards top; i: body covered with bright yellow paint, does not fully cover brown surface
title: Colored Vases (set of nine)
